titles.title: MP748 What a wonderful change in my life

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
What a wonderful change
in my life has been wrought
since Jesus came into my heart!
I have light in my soul
For which long I had sought,
since Jesus came into my heart!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I have ceased from my wandering
and going astray
since Jesus came into my heart!
And my sins, which were many,
are all washed away
since Jesus came into my heart!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I'm possessed of a hope
that is steadfast and sure,
since Jesus came into my heart!
And no dark clouds of doubt
now my pathway obscure,
since Jesus came into my heart!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
There's a light in the valley of death
now for me,
since Jesus came into my heart!
And the gates of the city beyond
I can see,
since Jesus came into my heart!

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
I shall go there to dwell in that city,
I know,
since Jesus came into my heart!
And I'm happy, so happy,
as onward I go,
since Jesus came into my heart!

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Since Jesus came into my heart,
since Jesus came into my heart,
floods of joy o'er my soul
like the sea billows roll,
since Jesus came into my heart!
